short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This software send sms to Hirise customer automatically.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This sms software is developed by Carsake and it's worked automatically to send all type of SMS from Hirise like Enquiry, Vehicle Sales, Service Reminder, Jobcard Open/Close And Service invoice etc. You can see all report in our online panel & also u can send bulk sms from our online panel.
